channel.title: Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a PhD student studying statistics at the University of Toronto, currently researching the health effects of air pollution.

item.title: Books
item.description: This page collects some of my long-form writing. Understanding Options (Work in Progress) I wrote Understanding Options to try and explain options pricing and options strategies in a simple and intutive way. It’s a work in progress - only the first two chapters are finished. Comments and suggestions are welcome.
